content.raw:
which gzweb branch are you using? You can try the `default` branch which should work with the gazebo and node versions you have 

Instead of running deploy.sh, you run:

`npm run deploy`

`npm run update`

and to start gzweb:

`npm start`

open the browser and go to localhost:8080. If nothing appears, bring up the developer console and see if there're any error msgs that look suspicious
content.html:
which gzweb branch are you using? You can try the default branch which should work with the gazebo and node versions you have

Instead of running deploy.sh, you run:

npm run deploy

npm run update

and to start gzweb:

npm start

open the browser and go to localhost:8080. If nothing appears, bring up the developer console and see if there're any error msgs that look suspicious
